1.0.name: wordpress/wp-facebookconnect
1.0.description:
WP-FacebookConnect adds Facebook functionality to Wordpress using the Facebook Connect APIs. Features include:

  • Single-signon with your Facebook account
  • Publish comments to the newsfeed
  • Comment avatars display Facebook profile photos

What's New:

1.3 - Add a "Like" button to posts - No longer set user_email because it no longer works, and overwrites user-entered addresses

1.2 - Template bundles have been replaced with the stream.publish API. Any template customizations will need to be updated for this API.
